* path
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: path
:END:
This is an exact copy of the NodeJS 'path' module published to the NPM
registry.

[[http://nodejs.org/docs/latest/api/path.html][Documentation]]

** Install
:PROPERTIES:
:CUSTOM_ID: install
:END:
#+begin_src sh
$ npm install --save path
#+end_src
